title: Move social/contact icons element above address in footer

requirements.summary: Reorder footer elements to move the social/contact icons block above the address/contact details block within the same footer column
acceptanceCriteria: The selected element is rendered above the address block in the footer column.
All other footer content and layout remain unchanged.
The footer is visually consistent across desktop and mobile viewports.

file_operations.description: Reorder the JSX structure within the Footer component so that the element currently at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/footer[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[2]/div[3] (the third div inside the second column group) appears before the address/contact details block. This is a JSX reordering onlyâ€”no content changes, no styling changes, and no new elements added or removed.
